CALIFORNIA 91409 . 988-3130. 873-5820 DIRECT DISTANCE DIALING AREA CODE 213 January 11th, 1979 The Immigration Department To Whom it May Concern: Please be advised that we employ Delta M. Ortiz as a Heidelberg press operator. She has been employed with the above stated company since May 4th, 1977 her present wage rate is $3. 125 per hour and works a 40 hour week, with overtime as needed. She is an efficient employee and continued employment probability is very good. Sincerely, Randell E.al-a Randall E. Olson Production Manager RO/ek STATE OF CALIFORNIA: COUNTY OF LOS ANGELES: SUBSCRIBED AND SWORN TO BEFORE ME THIS 22nd DAY OF JANUARY 1979. OFFICIAL SEAL Maria Tawas MARIA TERESA RAMIREZ Raving the CALIFORNIA and Maria Teresa Ramirez NOTARY PUBLIC NOTARY PUBLIC - CALIFORNIA PRINCIPAL OFFICE IN LOS ANGELES COUNTY My Commission Expires Mar. 5. 1982
